cards.name: Abyssal Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.name: Contagion
cards.text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Contagion's mana cost.
Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

cards.name: Dark Banishing
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Foul Familiar
cards.text:
Foul Familiar can't block.
{B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.

First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.

cards.name: Necropotence
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

cards.name: Phantasmal Fiend
cards.text:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Phantasmal Fiend
cards.text:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Soul Burn
cards.text:
Spend only black and/or red mana on X.
Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

cards.name: Balduvian Horde
cards.text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

cards.name: Death Spark
cards.text:
Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

cards.name: Goblin Mutant
cards.text:
Trample
Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

cards.name: Guerrilla Tactics
cards.text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Guerrilla Tactics
cards.text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Incinerate
cards.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

cards.name: Jokulhaups
cards.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Lava Burst
cards.text: Lava Burst deals X damage to target creature or player. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another creature or player.

cards.name: Orcish Cannoneers
cards.text: {T}: Orcish Cannoneers deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.

cards.name: Pillage
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Pyroclasm
cards.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.

cards.name: Bounty of the Hunt
cards.text:
You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay Bounty of the Hunt's mana cost.
Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

cards.name: Elvish Bard
cards.text: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

cards.name: Folk of the Pines

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

cards.name: Lhurgoyf
cards.text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

cards.name: Woolly Spider
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Giant Trap Door Spider

cards.name: Barbed Sextant

Defender
{3}: Walking Wall gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only once each turn.
